L

LoggingConfigFileMonitor - Class in org.microbean.java.logging
A special-purpose Thread that monitors a LogManager's configuration file for changes.
LoggingConfigFileMonitor() - Constructor for class org.microbean.java.logging.LoggingConfigFileMonitor
Creates a new LoggingConfigFileMonitor.
LogManager - Class in org.microbean.java.logging
A LogManager that creates and starts a new LoggingConfigFileMonitor when constructed.
LogManager() - Constructor for class org.microbean.java.logging.LogManager
Creates a new LogManager.

O

org.microbean.java.logging - package org.microbean.java.logging
Provides classes and interfaces that help with the Java logging system.

R

readConfiguration() - Method in class org.microbean.java.logging.LoggingConfigFileMonitor
Reloads and processes any new LogManager configuration following the rules described in the java.util.logging.LogManager documentation.
run() - Method in class org.microbean.java.logging.LoggingConfigFileMonitor
Monitors the LogManager configuration file for creation, modification or deletion, and, upon the observation of such a change, calls the LoggingConfigFileMonitor.readConfiguration() method.
